source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select 
	sch.name as SchemaName, 
	tbl.name as TableName 
	
	From sys.tables tbl 
	Inner Join sys.schemas sch on sch.schema_id = tbl.schema_id

	Order By SchemaName, TableName

Select sch.name + '.' + tbl.name as SchemaTableName, sch.name as SchemaName, tbl.name as TableName 
	From sys.tables tbl
	Inner Join sys.schemas sch on sch.schema_id = tbl.schema_id 
	Where type = 'U'

sqlReaderQuery.value: select max(LastModifytime) as NewwatermarkValue from data_src

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(LastModifytime) as NewwatermarkValue from data_src

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_src where LastModifytime > '@{activity('Lookup_datasrc').output.firstRow.watermarkValue}' and LastModifyTime <= '@{activity('Lookupwater').output.firstRow.Newwatermarkvalue}'
